overview: A Simple Love Story That Gets So Complicated.Rahul Has A Huge Crush On Riya And Is Friends With Her Best Friend Anjali. One Day Rahul Decides To Tell Anjali That He Is In Love With Riya But It Hit Both Of Them As A Huge Surprise As She Loved Him And Was Under The Impression That He Does The Same, She Gets Very Angry And Depressed. Rahul Reaches Riya’s House To Propose To Her, But What He Finds Out Leaves Him Angry And Depressed Too. He Heads Back To His House Where He Left Anjali, What He Finds Out Now Leaves Him Dismayed.
title: Move on
